newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Adcock forecasts yr shr up over 20 pct.
newsitem.headline: Adcock forecasts yr shr up over 20 pct.

text.p: Adcock Ingram Ltd said on Wednesday growth on its headline earnings per share for the full year is forecast to exceed 20 percent as the benefits of a restructuring flow through strongly in the second half.

"The enlarged group's excellent positioning in the market together with the significant attention we are giving to the development and acquisition of new products and continued focus on asset management will ensure strong performances in the medium and long term," said Phil Nortier, group chief executive.
Adcock last year merged with Premier Pharmaceuticals, raising its share of the South African pharmaceuticals market to about 15 percent.

The group on Wednesday reported first half headline earnings up 15 percent at 54.3 cents a share and its dividend improved by 19 percent to 15 cents a share. However, Adcock cautioned that the results were not comparable with last year due to the merger.
